articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Japan arrived here on Tuesday to take part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Hamhung
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Hamhung
 Hamhung, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troupe is on a performance tour of Hamhung from Apr. 4.
					 Among the audience were workers of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex and people from all walks of life and officials in the province.
					
					 The performance began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as female duet "His Humanity".
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by female solo and pangchang "Where Are You, Dear General?", an immortal masterpiece, as it made them recollect with deep emotion the loving care shown by leader Kim Jong Il and the total dedication made by him while giving field guidance to the province till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster" and other numbers instilled fervent enthusiasm for revolution and struggle into the workers of the province recording proud feats performed in the production of Juche vinalon and Juche fertilizers in their diaries of the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					
					 Artistes staged such numbers as dance "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" reflecting the iron will that Korea does what it is determined to do and the resolute stand of all the service personnel and people not to pardon the enemies trying to encroach upon the DPRK and tap dance "Young Days". They were acclaimed by the audience for dynamic rhythm and peculiar artistic representation.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Workers' Art Group Gives Performance
articles.content:
Workers' Art Group Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways on Tuesday to celebrate the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Our General Is the Great Songun Brilliant Commander", dialogic poem "Great Devotion and Ponghwa" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal revolutionary careers and noble feats of Kim Jong Il at man who performed the undying exploits for the era and the revolution.
					
					 They represented the fighting spirit of the working class hastening the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign of loyalty and accelerating the day of a final victory in numbers such as female duet "Everlasting Echo".
					
					 Among the audience were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, and its officials and members, and workers.

articles.title: Posters Produced for April Spring Friendship Art Festival
articles.content:
Posters Produced for April Spring Friendship Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Posters were produced in the DPRK for the upcoming 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 A poster, which depicts female artistes in various national costumes holding up the logo of the festival with such words as "Welcome", "Let us sing loudly the song of independence, peace and friendship!" depicted against the background of the earth vividly shows the idea of the festival and the friendly feelings of the Korean people for the artistes coming to Pyongyang from various parts of the world with repertoires they prepared with sincerity.
					
					 There are posters, which depict conductors, singers and instrumentalists enthusiastically displaying their high skills and acrobats showcasing their refined stunts. They draw great expectation and attention to the festival.
					
					 Another poster shows the list of the art groups taking part in the festival.

articles.title: Method of Producing High-purity Tourmaline Established
articles.content:
Method of Producing High-purity Tourmaline Established
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Central Mining Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK developed a new method of mass-producing high-purity tourmaline.
					  Tourmaline is drawing attention as one of materials favorable for environmental and health improvement, as it emits far infrared rays and anion and contains microelements.
					
					 Recently, functional tourmaline products are getting popular for their medical effectiveness across the world.

articles.title: Pyongyang Speed Created in 1950s
articles.content:
Pyongyang Speed Created in 1950s
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, recently declared the construction of Ryomyong Street. The news recall the people of the DPRK to the Chollima age when the Pyongyang speed was created in building the capital city of Pyongyang in the 1950s after the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					 President Kim Il Sung convened a plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in October Juche 46 (1957) to take decisive measures for effecting a surge in construction, after acquainting himself in detail about the situation in which the WPK's policy of prefabricated construction was hindered by factionalists and conservatives.
					
					 And he chaired several rounds of conferences for the construction of Pyongyang in January 1958. He even had face-to-face talks with designers and builders to pick up their opinions and indicate the ways to speed up the construction.
					
					 Under his guidance, they worked such a miracle as building 20,000 flats out of materials, funds and manpower equivalent to 7,000 flats, raising the construction speed 7.3 times.
					
					 Thanks to the overall introduction of prefabrication, new records and norms were set in the field of construction. Thereby, it took only 14 minutes to fabricate a flat, which has been called the Pyongyang speed.
					
					 After a few years since then, a number of monumental edifices like the Pyongyang Grand Theater, Okryu Restaurant, Okryu Bridge and Pothonggang and Taesongsan pleasure parks took their shapes in Pyongyang.
					
					 Now servicepersons and people of the DPRK are full of determination to make lead forwards one after another in building a prosperous nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Training Working Class as Core Unit for Juche Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Training Working Class as Core Unit for Juche Revolution 
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean working class are the one of the leaders and the Juche type as they were born and grew up to be staunch workers under the care and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a joint article.
					 The great leaders trained the Korean workers to be strong in idea and faith and a core unit for socialist construction with inexhaustible creative ingenuity and high cultural attainments, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 In the whole period of the revolutionary leadership the great leaders worked heart and soul to awaken the workers politically and ideologically and firmly equip them with revolutionary spirit.
					
					 All the factories and enterprises across the country are associated with the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men who instilled into the masses awareness as masters of the factories and the country and inspired them to rise up, overcoming all difficulties by their own efforts.
					
					 The great leaders grasped and valued the creative ingenuity and skills of the workers dearer than any others and let them display greater energies in the struggle and the drive for effecting changes on the road of revolution and put forward them as the most dignified and powerful beings of society in history.
					
					 They clarified the truth that revolutionary and progressive culture is created by the working class and led them to increase their role in creation of the new socialist culture.
					
					 The Korean workers have enjoyed the happiest life under the special loving care of the great leaders.
					
					 The great leaders are always with our people including the workers and their august names will shine forever as a banner of victory and glory of the working class.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Illegality of U.S. Forces' Occupation of S. Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Illegality of U.S. Forces' Occupation of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A recent issue of the Chinese newspaper Huan Qiu Shibao in an article disclosed the illegality of the "U.S.-south Korea mutual defense treaty", a "legal foundation" of the U.S. military occupation of south Korea.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says that the U.S. is taking much pain to attach legality to its military occupation of south Korea and describe even the aggressive joint military exercises as those for coping with someone's "threat" but the illegality of its military presence is the unbiased world opinion.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 By origin, the U.S. has no justification to occupy south Korea militarily.
					
					 Korea is no defeated nation in the Second World War like Japan. The U.S. forces, however, landed in south Korea under the pretext of "disarming" defeated Japanese troops.
					
					 The U.S. formed a military alliance with its followers and is using them as a shock brigade in carrying out its criminal strategy for stifling the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 Such moves are posing a serious threat to the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence and creating such an extremely dangerous situation on the Korean peninsula that a war may break out any time. 
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. military presence in south Korea is a main factor of constant tension on the peninsula.
					
					 This goes to prove once again that the "U.S.-south Korea mutual defense treaty" is, indeed, illegal both in name and reality.
					
					 The root cause of misfortune should be rooted out in time.
					
					 If the international community sincerely desires peace in Korea and the rest of Asia and the world, it should completely destroy the den of wolves in south Korea as soon as possible.

articles.title: Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye Group of Rubbing Salt into Wounds of Divided Families and Relatives
articles.content:
Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye Group of Rubbing Salt into Wounds of Divided Families and Relatives
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces recently  asserted that more than a half of the south Korean applicants for the reunion of separated families and relatives passed away and their death rate would increase in the future in a bid to create impression that they are greatly concerned for the reunion of divided families and relatives. 
					 Newspapers here Tuesday in commentaries term it an evil act of rubbing salt into the wounds of the divided families and relatives and insulting to ethics and represents the height of shamelessness.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun  observes: Such rhetoric reeled off by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is aimed to give an impression that they are concerned for the reunion of divided families and relations in a bid to pass the buck for its failure upon the DPRK and weather the daily deepening crisis of the regime. 
					
					 But it is foolish to pull the wool over the eyes of the world people with such cheep gimmicks.
					
					 The Park group has committed too many crimes against the country and the nation to evade the responsibility for bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse and bridge over the extreme ruling crisis with such poor artifice. 
					
					 There can be no humanitarian cooperation between the north and the south including the reunion of the divided families and relatives as long as such confrontation maniac as Park Geun Hye stays in power.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the army and people of the DPRK will never allow the Park group of traitors keen to abuse the humanitarian issue including the reunion of the divided families and relatives for the confrontation with compatriots but force them to pay dearly for their crimes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Planning to Deploy F-35s
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Planning to Deploy F-35s
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- U.S. F-35s will be deployed in Iwakuni base, Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan from next year, according to foreign press reports.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this a revelation of the military scenario of the U.S. and Japanese aggressor forces to secure air superiority in contingency and occupy the DPRK through intensive air strikes.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the Japanese reactionaries are following the nuclear war scenario of the U.S. at a time when their enforcement of the security legislation is triggering off serious concerns of the international community.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are frantically rushing into militarism and desperately pushing forward the moves to deploy U.S. stealth fighters in Japan, escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK can never overlook the Japanese reactionaries' scenario to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula any moment in league with the U.S. 
					
					 Japan has gone so ridiculous as to work hard to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" which it failed to do so in the past.
					
					 It is no more than a daydream that the Japanese reactionaries who have grown corpulent, backed by the U.S., try to fish in troubled waters, pursuant to Washington's policy of aggression even in the 21st century, too.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should bear in mind that launching bases are the primary targets in modern warfare.
					
					 Their steady introduction of U.S. forces will only precipitate their ruin.

articles.title: U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Dynamic Movement for National Reunification
articles.content:
U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Dynamic Movement for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Hheadquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held the 26th general meeting of its Central Committee in Los Angeles on April 2.
					 Paek Sung Bae, chairman of the U.S. headquarters of Pomminryon, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 Referring to Pomminryon's indomitable movement for national reunification despite all difficulties and ordeals, he called upon Koreans in the U.S. to dynamically turn out in the struggle to bring the day of reunification when all Koreans will be able to live together.
					
					 The meeting heard a report on 2014-2015 activities before discussing the issues of intensifying the movement for reunification this year.

articles.title: U.S. Is Biggest Obstacle to "World without Nuclear Weapons": S. Korean Media
articles.content:
U.S. Is Biggest Obstacle to "World without Nuclear Weapons": S. Korean Media
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial Sunday said the much advertised 4th "nuclear security summit" dropped its curtain but it was an unfair one as it was a far cry from its original objective. It went on:
					 The "summit" did not refer to the U.S., which has conducted the biggest number of nuclear tests in the world after stockpiling more nukes than any others and is still staging nuclear war drills on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the biggest obstacle to the "world without nuclear weapons" touted by it.
					
					 The U.S. cannot escape catastrophe unless it rolls back its hostile policy toward the north, the policy of threatening it with nukes.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Action Staged by KCTU
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Action Staged by KCTU
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting for inheriting the April 3 resistance before the Jeju City Office on Sunday, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 At the meeting speakers said that 68 years have passed since the people of Jeju Island held aloft the flag of resistance to oppose the Syngman Rhee clique's "separate elections" and build a reunified country.
					
					 They declared that the forthcoming "elections" are not simple "National Assembly" elections but a struggle for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula by punishing the warmongers and an anti-regime action for punishing the rulers enforcing policies against the people and democracy and humiliating diplomacy.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration.
					
					 Upon arrival at the island on March 2 members of the confederation went round the places where islanders were mercilessly killed during the uprising to honor their memory.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Hungarian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Hungarian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary, on its website on March 29.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Works of Marshal Kim Jong Un were brought out in pamphlets by the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House in Russia to mark the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The published works were "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution", "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun".
					
					 The first work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution", published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The work " Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun", published on September 18, 2014, clarifies that the Korean youths have covered the glorious way by performing heroic feats and winning proud victory for many years of the revolution under the wise leadership and benevolent loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for the Korean youths to successfully fulfill their role as young vanguard of the party in the present historic advance and ways for doing so. 
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place on March 28.

articles.title: Russian Personage Is Certain of Koreans' Victory
articles.content:
Russian Personage Is Certain of Koreans' Victory
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- We are sure that the Korean people will win. 
					 Robanov, general director of the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House in Russia said this at a ceremony for releasing works of Marshal Kim Jong Un on March 28.
					
					 He added:
					
					 It is thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un that the Korean people keeps to the path of socialism despite the U.S. imperialists' persistent moves to stifle the country.
					
					 Reading his works I felt once again that he has, indeed, a matchless courage and warm love for the country and the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Romania, Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Romania, Thailand
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held by the New Socialist Party of Romania and the Socialist Party of Romania and at Rajabat Pranakorn University in Thailand on March 21 and 28 to mark his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present at the seminars were figures of the New Socialist Party of Romania, the Socialist Party of Romania, the Romania-Korea Friendship Association, the Thai preparatory committee for the Day of the Sun and the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu and Rajabat Pranakorn University in Thailand and masses. 
					
					 The reporters and speakers including Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, praised the President as a peerless patriot and elder statesman who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association said it is entirely a brilliant result of the wise leadership of the President that the DPRK is displaying its might as a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Thai preparatory committee for the Day of the Sun and the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, said the President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind for his great exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Public organizations in different countries posted articles on their websites on March 27 and 29 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun said in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, great man in the century":
					
					 Human history knows no other man greater than the President who is boundlessly revered by all people through centuries.
					
					 He was a pioneer and guide of the era of independence as he founded the Juche idea and indicated the way for mankind to follow.
					
					 The Juche idea grips the hearts of all people and is widely studied and disseminated for its scientific accuracy, truth and vitality proved in Korea.
					
					 He was the elder statesman of the world who upheld the banner of the anti-imperialist independence and steered the cause of human independence and the greatest man who led to victory the cause of global independence by steering the helm of independence.
					
					 His life was a brilliant one of a genuine internationalist.
					
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the articles such as "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" introduced his positive support for the people of many countries for their national liberation and the building of a new society, saying that heads of state and prominent figures of many countries boundlessly revered him and highly praised him.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Russia and Malaysia and lectures in Benin and Angola from March 25 to 29 with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The chairperson of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of "A Just Russia" and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the leader of the people who liberated Korea and devoted his all to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the President as the gifted thinker and theoretician. He went on:
					
					 The President fathered the Juche idea with a deep insight into the requirement of the new era of history in the early period of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The Juche idea is the great guiding idea for the cause of human independence giving clear answers to all the theoretical and practical problems arising in realizing independence of the popular masses.
					
					 The technical advisor of the Special Project Room of the Presidency of Angola in a lecture said no other great man has been boundlessly praised by all people century after century in human history as Kim Il Sung, lauding him as the elder statesman of the world who led the cause of human independence under the uplifted banner of independence all his life.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Hungary
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Hungary
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Budapest on March 31.
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Int'l Organization Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Organization Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea released a statement on March 31.
					 The statement said that the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK cooked up by the UN Security Council sparked off anger of the world progressive people.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea conducted joint military maneuvers to invade the DPRK and extremely escalated the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 But the UNSC connives at such aggressive moves.
					
					 The Korean people had no other option but to develop means for self-defence to cope with the U.S. threat that has lasted century after century.
					
					 The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea calls upon all the countries to reject the said "resolution on sanctions".
					
					 Global progressive mankind demands the U.S. stop at once the dangerous joint military exercises with south Korea aiming at the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon the global peace-loving people once again to condemn the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and strongly demand the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica obrera de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica obrera de FGSC
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo central de propaganda artistica obrera de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) ofrecio el dia 5 en la Casa Cultural del Ministerio del Ferrocarril una funcion dedicada al 23o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion se presentaron varios programas inclusive el coro "Nuestro General es gran genial comandante de Songun" y la poesia en narracion "Antorcha de gran abnegacion". 
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron en tono patetico la imperecedera vida revolucionaria y las valiosas hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El duo femenino "Eco eterno" y otras piezas reflejaron el espiritu combativo de la clase obrera que adelanta el dia de victoria final acelerando el avance de la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad.
					
					Presenciaron la funcion Ju Yong Gil, presidente del CC de la FGSC, los obreros, los funcionarios y miembros de la FGSC.

articles.title: Publicadas pancartas con motivo del Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Publicadas pancartas con motivo del Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se publicaron las pancartas en visperas del 30o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					La pancarta, en que saltan a la vista los aspectos de las artistas en vestidos folcloricos de diversas naciones sosteniendo la insignia del festival con la Tierra en el trasfondo y estan escritas las letras como "Bienvenido" y "!Vamos a cantar en tono alto las canciones de independencia, paz y amistad!", muestra bien el ideal del festival y el sentimiento amistoso del pueblo coreano a las misiones artisticas que vienen a Pyongyang, capital del festival atravesando el continente y el oceano llevando consigo las piezas preparadas con sinceridad.
					
					Los afiches alusivos a los directores, cantantes, interpretes y acrobatas levantan gran esperanza e interes sobre el presente festival.
					
					Hay tambien las pancartas que describen las entidades artisticas participantes en el presente festival.

articles.title: Periodicos capitalinos denuncian disparates de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Periodicos capitalinos denuncian disparates de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los titeres surcoreanos actuan como si tuvieran gran interes en el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados disparatando que mas de la mitad entre los solicitadores de la parte surena de esta reunion ya paso al otro mundo y en el futuro se elevara mas la tasa de mortalidad.
					 Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron el dia 5 comentarios individuales calificandolo del cinismo extremado y la accion malvada tendente a dar sablazos en la herida de corazon de los familiares separados e insultar la moralidad.
					
					 El diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el objetivo de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye reside en imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de no realizar dicho encuentro y en salvar la cada dia mas grave crisis del "poder" al darse aire de bienhechor como si preste atencion a esta labor, y prosigue:
					
					  Pero es muy absurdo el intento de enganar a todo el mundo con tales disparates.
					
					  Para evadirse de la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones Norte-Sur y evitar la extremada crisis de gobernacion con tal accion desmanada, es muy grande el crimen cometido por la pandilla traidora de Park Geun-hye ante el pais y la nacion.
					
					  Mientras la maniaca de confrontacion como Park Geun-hye tome el poder, no podra realizarse cualquier cooperacion humanitaria entre el Norte y el Sur incluyendo el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados.
					
					  Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson senala que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea nunca toleraran sino calcularan cabalmente el crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion de la horda traidora de Park Geun-hye, maniaca de confrontacion fratricida que pretende abusar hasta del problema humanitario en el enfrentamiento fratricida

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de Japon de disponer cazabombarderos tipo Stealth F-35
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de Japon de disponer cazabombarderos tipo Stealth F-35
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Segun las prensas extranjeras, se emplazaran oficialmente los cazabombarderos tipo Stealth F-35 en la base de Iwakuni del departamento de Yamaguchi de Japon desde el ano proximo.
					 Esto significa que las fuerzas agresoras de los Estados Unidos y Japon se revelaron su intento militar de tomar en su mano el dominio aereo y dar el golpe aereo concentrado para ocupar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el tiempo de emergencia.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					  Lo mas intolerable es que los reaccionarios japoneses obedecen a las maniobras de EE.UU. por la guerra nuclear cuando causan la preocupacion grave de la sociedad internacional poniendo en vigor la ley de seguridad.
					
					  Debido a las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses de emplazar en su pais los cazas norteamericanos corriendo locamente por el camino del militarismo, se agrava mas la tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Nunca toleraremos los intentos de los reaccionarios japoneses por invadir en cualquier tiempo la Peninsula Coreana en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					  Resultan muy ridiculas las maquinaciones desesperadas de Japon por realizar a toda costa su sueno viejo de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" no lograda en el pasado.
					
					  Tambien en el siglo XXI los reaccionarios japoneses, engordados bajo el amparo de EE.UU., tratan de lograr ganancias adhiriendose activamente a la politica agresiva de EE.UU., pero esto es una ilusion irrealizable.
					
					  Deben tener presente que en la guerra moderna la base del despegue es primer blanco de golpe.
					
					  Si ellos siguen introduciendo las tropas norteamericanas produciran solo la ruina de Japon.
